src_original: yā gatiḥ pretya gacchantī tānapāyān (hi me) śṛṇu // Dhs_16.1 //
sañjīvaṃ kāmasūtraṃ ca sampātaṃ dvau ca rauravau /
raudrakarmābhisaṅkīrṇāḥ pratyekaṃ kṣobhadā (matāḥ) // Dhs_16.3 //  narakāgnīnāṃ bhayānakatvam
kandarpadamanā ghorā arciṣmanto durāsadāḥ /  romaharṣaṇarūpāste 'pyāhurduḥkhā bhayānakāḥ // Dhs_16.6 //  narake patitā bhṛśaṃ tapyante  ete patanti narake ūrdhvapādā avāṅmukhāḥ /
